headline: Aster Is Said to Near Deal With Blackstone-Backed Quality Care

headline: Blackstone: Extreme Bubble Valuation
summary: We warn investors of Blackstone's extreme valuation, weak cash flow, and dividend yields, suggesting caution and a lower price target range. Read more here.
